mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_school_attachments ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, school_name, contract_file1, contract_file2, contract_file3, remarks) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{schoolName}, #{contractFile1}, #{contractFile2}, #{contractFile3}, #{remarks});
